query: SELECT id, guest_name, status, check_in_at, expires_at, duration, reminder_shown, NOW() as server_now, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, NOW(), expires_at) as seconds_until_expiry FROM guest_sessions WHERE status IN ('active', 'extended') ORDER BY expires_at ASC LIMIT 20;
